attributes.additional_details: The British Public has the right to go back to the polling booths to vote for the party that will protect their interest best in the negotiations moving forwards with Europe regarding our exit from the EU.
attributes.background:
The Conservative government has no leader and has no intentions of choosing one for at least 3 months. 
We need a clear manifesto from each party as to what they will do to protect trade, jobs, movement of people and which laws will be rewritten.
